source_caption_data.pre_caption:
This video presents a static, eye-level shot of a residential property. The camera remains still throughout the clip, offering a clear view of the scene.

The focal point is a large, two-story brick house with a steep, dark-shingled roof and an arched entryway. A black wrought-iron fence runs across the foreground, enclosing a manicured green lawn and lush landscaping that includes a prominent yucca plant and various shrubs. Palm trees can be seen in the background under an overcast sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: This is not a static shot, The camera shows some minor movement. The camera is panning left to right and tilting down.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The video is not a static shot as described. There is minor camera movement, including panning from left to right and tilting downward.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The video is not a static shot as described. There is minor camera movement, including panning from left to right and tilting downward.
source_caption_data.gpt_caption: This video features a residential property captured with minor camera movement. The clip includes panning from left to right and a downward tilt, providing a dynamic view of the scene. The focal point is a large, two-story brick house with a steep, dark-shingled roof and an arched entryway. A black wrought-iron fence runs across the foreground, enclosing a manicured green lawn and lush landscaping that includes a prominent yucca plant and various shrubs. Palm trees can be seen in the background under an overcast sky.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video features a residential property captured with minor camera movement. The clip includes panning from left to right and a downward tilt, providing a dynamic view of the scene. The focal point is a large, two-story brick house with a steep, dark-shingled roof and an arched entryway. A black wrought-iron fence runs across the foreground, enclosing a manicured green lawn and lush landscaping that includes a prominent yucca plant and various shrubs. Palm trees can be seen in the background under an overcast sky.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly focuses on describing the static architectural and landscaping details of the property, which contradicts the instruction to prioritize motion over appearance. While it accurately notes the camera's pan and tilt, it completely omits any potential movement within the scene itself. For example, the video likely shows the fronds of the prominent yucca plant and the leaves of the shrubs swaying gently in a breeze as the camera moves across the yard. Furthermore, the palm trees in the background are probably not static but are rustling against the overcast sky. A more effective description would remove the static details about the brick, roof, and fence, and instead describe the camera's path while incorporating these subtle, natural movements of the foliage to provide a more accurate and dynamic account of the video's content.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video captures a dynamic view of a residential property, with the camera smoothly panning and tilting to reveal the scene. The focus is on the natural movement within the yard, as the fronds of a prominent yucca plant and the leaves of various shrubs sway gently in the breeze. In the background, palm trees rustle softly against an overcast sky, adding to the serene atmosphere. The camera's motion across the yard highlights these subtle, natural movements, offering a lively and engaging perspective of the property.
